description: Dima was engaged in the development of the footer, as well as this beautiful modal window.
Anya, our beautiful Scrum master, held daily meetings and developed a header and a library.
Alisa was involved in the implementation of the functions of rendering the watched films and films in the queue.
Andriy implemented the function of searching films by keyword.
Misha worked on the development of a modal window and functionality for adding films by the user.
Vika was engaged in the layout of the film card and render.
Taras was engaged in setting up all calls to the api and activities related to pagination
